org.js4ms.server

Class ConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.js4ms.server.ConnectionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ConnectionHandler
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Base class for objects that manage the serialization of messages over a Connection. This class simply flushes bytes from the connection input stream.
    Author:
    Greg Bumgardner (gbumgard)

      • setConnection

        protected void setConnection(Connection connection)
        Sets the connection managed by this handler. Used to switch connections, primarily for tunneling. If the previous connection is no longer needed it should be closed.
        Parameters:
        connection -
